title: Pinball.FX2.Balls.of.Glory.Pinball-HI2U
description:
HI2U!

Pinball FX2 (c) Microsoft Studios

Release Date : 21st October, 2015
Protection   : Steam
Type         : Casual, Simulation
Size         : 1 Disc

Description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~

Pinball FX2 is an ever-growing collection of original pinball table
simulations built by Zen Studios, the world's premier virtual pinball
developer.


Pinball FX2 pairs classic pinball gameplay with themes from Star Wars, Marvel
and more. Pick and choose the tables you like from a selection of dozens -
there's something for everyone!


Meticulously constructed in painstaking detail, each table is instantly
approachable yet offers dozens of hours of replay value.


You'll need all the practice you can get to defeat your friends' high scores
and earn the title of Pinball King.


Key Features
*  23 tables to choose from at launch, including table themes based on Star
 Wars, Marvel and more!
*  New tables released regularly
*  Keyboard, mouse, and controller support
*  Achievements for every table
*  The competition gets intense with in-game friend score challenges
*  Local and online leaderboards
*  Multiple scoring systems including Superscore and Wizard Score
*  Trial versions for all tables
*  16:9 and 16:10 aspect ratio support
*  Local hotseat mutiplayer


Including the following DLC's

Marvel Pinball Original Pack
Zen Classics Pack
Marvel Pinball Avengers Chronicles pack
Marvel Pinball Vengeance and Virtue Pack
Star Wars Pack
Epic Quest Table
Paranormal Table
Fantastic Four Table
Civil War Table
Captain America Table
Mars Table
Excalibur Table
Earth Defense Table
Plants VS. Zombies Table
Star Wars Pinball: Balance of the Force Pack
Doctor Strange Table
Super League - A.C. Milan Table
Super League - Real Madrid C.F. Table
Super League - A.S. Roma Table
Super League - Liverpool F.C. Table
Super League - Juventus Table
Super League - Arsenal F.C.  Table
Super League - FC Barcelona Table
Super League - Zen Studios F.C. Table
Star Wars Pinball: Heroes Within Pack
Deadpool Table
Guardians of the Galaxy Table
The Walking Dead Table
South Park Pinball
Venom Table
Iron & Steel Pack
Marvel's Avengers: Age of Ultron
Star Wars Pinball: Star Wars Rebels
Portal Pinball
Marvel's Ant-Man
Balls of Glory Pinball


Install:
~~~~~~~
Unrar, mount/burn, install the game, copy crack and play!
